key_issues: Perfect price consistency (60.71) across Yahoo Finance, Alpha Vantage, and FMP CLI services
Financial metrics validated against FMP cash flow data showing operational cash flow decline but strong balance sheet
Market cap calculation verified: $36.23B matches across all CLI sources
Company intelligence properly extracted with accurate sector (Technology) and industry (Computer Hardware) classification
Financial health grades appropriately reflect cash flow challenges (C+ grade) and balance sheet strength (A- grade)
Competitive moat assessment properly identifies AI server specialization with 15% market share
Risk matrix correctly identifies working capital strain (0.50 probability, impact 3) as primary financial risk
Economic context properly integrated with Fed funds rate 5.33% and moderately restrictive environment
ROIC calculation (18%) validated against WACC (12%) showing value creation
Investment thesis coherently links AI infrastructure demand (25% CAGR) with SMCI's 15% AI server market share
Fair value range ($75-95) appropriately reflects DCF ($82), comps ($78), and sum-of-parts ($86) methodologies
Economic sensitivity properly modeled with 1.8x GDP elasticity and -0.45 Fed correlation coefficient
Risk-adjusted return (22%) and Sharpe ratio (1.6) calculations validated against volatility and risk-free rate
Template compliance verified with all required sections present and properly formatted

verified_claims_high_confidence: Current price $60.71 validated across 3 CLI sources with 0.0% variance
Market cap $36.23B calculated and verified consistently
AI server market share 15% supported by industry analysis and peer comparison
Fed funds rate 5.33% confirmed via FRED CLI with moderately restrictive classification
Working capital challenges validated through FMP CLI cash flow data showing -$2.61B free cash flow
Balance sheet strength confirmed with current ratio 2.1 and debt/equity 0.15
Economic sensitivity coefficients validated: GDP +0.62, Fed -0.45, crypto +0.41
questionable_claims_medium_confidence: AI server market growth rate 25% CAGR - reasonable but dependent on continued AI infrastructure investment
Manufacturing utilization 85% - estimated metric not directly verified through CLI sources
unverifiable_claims: Customer satisfaction metrics - qualitative assessment not CLI-verifiable
Some competitive intelligence claims require proprietary industry data

material_concerns: Working capital management challenges impacting free cash flow generation
Moderate customer concentration risk with hyperscale dependency
refinement_needed: Manufacturing utilization rate needs verification through company guidance
Customer satisfaction metrics should be supported by survey data if available

follow_up_research: Monitor quarterly working capital efficiency improvements
Track AI server market share progression versus Dell/HPE competition
Verify manufacturing capacity utilization through management guidance
